guide.introduction: This design is simple, easy to mass produce, but needs some practice to nail it just right...
guide.introduction_rendered:
This design is simple, easy to mass produce, but needs some practice to nail it just right...

Relevant parts
  • long cardboard tube
  • box of potassium nitrate
  • box of sulfur powder (flowers)
  • box activated charcoal (for aquarium purifiers)
  • Aluminum foil
  • blue tape
  • fast fuse
Tools
  • Hammer
  • old cutting board
  • popsicle stick
  • small hacksaw

lines.text: First of all, mix the three chemicals together with a 1:1:1ratio. You should make about 3 tablespoons as a baseline. You can use the popsicle stick to do that.
lines.text_raw: First of all, mix the three chemicals together with a 1:1:1ratio. You should make about 3 tablespoons as a baseline. You can use the popsicle stick to do that.

lines.text: Use the hammer to crush the the mix until finely crushed and mixed(see photos). Be careful! If you hit the gunpowder mix too hard, it can auto-ignite, causing serious burns.
lines.text_raw: Use the hammer to crush the the mix until finely crushed and mixed(see photos). Be careful! If you hit the gunpowder mix too hard, it can auto-ignite, causing serious burns.

lines.text: Cut the cardboard tube into desired length(2 inches is a good baseline). Cover the tube entirely with a 2-3 layer coat of blue tape.
lines.text_raw: Cut the cardboard tube into desired length(2 inches is a good baseline). Cover the tube entirely with a 2-3 layer coat of blue tape.

lines.text: Take a long, thin piece of tinfoil then loosely crumple it up into a long blob. Set your cardboard tube piece upright on a table then drop the blob of foil in. Use the butt of the screwdriver to pack the blob down tightly.
lines.text_raw: Take a long, thin piece of tinfoil then loosely crumple it up into a long blob. Set your cardboard tube piece upright on a table then drop the blob of foil in. Use the butt of the screwdriver to pack the blob down tightly.

lines.text: Fill the tube up almost the entire way with the gunpowder.
